item.description:
11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation

Prepare to be Heard By Millions!

3 Sacred Steps to Being An Empowered Messenger

By Amethyst Wyldfyre, Chief Enjoyment Officer of The Empowered Messenger

Now, more than ever it is VITAL for those who have been CALLED to be Messengers to be prepared and to step in to their roles as agents of change for our world.  There are countless people out there who have experienced some kind of an awakening and are receiving new information, new ideas and new thoughts about how to create transformation in every sector of industry and life. 

 Many of these “Messengers” know and are experiencing at the CORE of their being an urgent need to get the word out there and touch hundreds, thousands, even millions of people.  Some have even “seen” themselves on Oprah or some other big platform where their message is being spread far and wide and people are being significantly impacted and inspired to transform their own lives as a result of hearing their unique message.

Many are being called to spread their message through a variety of means – books, art, performances, radio shows, teleclasses, workshops, speaking on stage, networking and creating communities, online tv shows, mini-movies, audio programs and more.

And yet….. They are actually sitting at home – with their book, artwork, performance piece, speech or program idea only getting out to a very few if any people.  The TENSION that’s created between the vision and the reality can be extraordinary.   The deep soul urging to get out there and BE the Messenger they came to be countered by the aspects of the soul that are deeply afraid to actually step into the Empowered Messenger role are at WAR with each other!

It’s time to make PEACE within your own soul and PREPARE to be Heard By Millions!

About Amethyst –

Amethyst Wyldfyre – The Speakers Shaman and Divine Destiny Mastery Mentor is an EMPOWERED Messenger!  A Multidimensional Visionary Speaker, Author, Teacher and Artist, she specializes in serving visionary leaders and conscious entrepreneurs who want to feel Safe, Powerful and Ready to LEAP fearlessly into their highest level of service and who want to profit handsomely from following their Spiritual path.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network
